alert.note: Alert for Baltimore; Harford (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 6:35PM EDT until June 26 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Harford County in northern Maryland... Central Baltimore County in northern Maryland... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 635 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pikesville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management reported wind damage in Pikesville, MD. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Cockeysville, Towson, Parkville, Bel Air North, Carney, Perry Hall, Mays Chapel, Timonium, Fallston, Hampton, Kingsville, Jarrettsville, Lutherville-Timonium, Lutherville, Glen Arm, Fork, Long Green, Phoenix, Loch Raven Village and Jacksonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
